name: Camera Click Interaction
description:
This is an interaction of a digital camera demonstrating the zoom in, zoom out, and shutter action when a photograph is clicked. The design and interaction is made entirely in Figma.


Share and spread the love!

If you have any suggestions/inputs/ideas, please feel free to reach out to me.
